alert.note: Alert for Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Gates of the Mountains; Helena Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 4:49AM MST until January 14 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow in the mountains. Rain may mix with snow or freezing rain at times in the valleys. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the mountains, but only up to one inch of slushy snow in the valleys. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains, Gates of the Mountains, Helena Valley, Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icing may still occur in some areas where rain is falling and air temperatures are above freezing, as rain will freeze on surfaces that still below freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Gates of the Mountains; Helena Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
